sentence.Network_en: The sun slid behind trees, its last light diffused by wintry branches.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳躲到了树后，余晖透过冬日的树枝洒落下来。

sentence.Network_en: He was, according to witnesses, extremely wintry with Her Royal Highness.
sentence.Network_cn: 据目击者称，他对女王殿下极其冷淡。

sentence.Network_en: Wintry weather continues to sweep across Britain.
sentence.Network_cn: 寒冷的天气继续席卷整个英国。

wintery 如冬的wintriness 寒冷wintry 寒冷的

entry.def: Wintry weather is cold and has features that are typical of winter.

example.ex: Wintry weather continues to sweep across Britain...
example.tran: 寒冷的天气继续席卷整个英国。

entry.tran: (态度或行为)冷冰冰的，冷淡的
entry.def: If you describe someone's attitude or behaviour as wintry, you mean that they seem very unfriendly.

example.ex: He was, according to witnesses, extremely wintry with Her Royal Highness.
example.tran: 据目击者称，他对女王殿下极其冷淡。

means.word_mean: 1. characteristic of or occurring in winter;
2. devoid of warmth and cordiality; expressive of unfriendliness or disdain;

auth_sentence.content: But others are taking advantage of the wintry weather.
auth_sentence.res_content: But others are taking advantage of the wintry weather.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But others are taking advantage of the wintry weather.

auth_sentence.content: You're up very early on this wintry morning.
auth_sentence.res_content: You're up very early on this wintry morning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You're up very early on this wintry morning.

auth_sentence.content: The nakedness and asperity of the wintry world.
auth_sentence.res_content: The nakedness and asperity of the wintry world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The nakedness and asperity of the wintry world.

means.word_mean: 冬天的；冬天似的;寒冷的;风雪交加的

sentences.en: The wintry sun was already low in the sky.
sentences.cn: 一轮冬日已经低垂天幕。

sentences.en: The fields have frosted over in this wintry morning.
sentences.cn: 在这寒冷的早晨田野里覆盖着一层霜。
